Identifier / Formula: \vec{F} = \left(\gamma^3 m a_x, \gamma m a_y, \gamma m a_z\right),
Name: relativistic force (N/A)

Identifier / Formula: \boldsymbol\alpha = \frac{1}{r^2}(\mathbf r\times \frac{d\mathbf v}{dt} + \frac{d\mathbf r}{dt}\times \mathbf v)-\frac{2}{r^3}\frac{dr}{dt}(\mathbf r\times\mathbf v)\\\\ = \frac{1}{r^2}(\mathbf r\times \mathbf a + \mathbf v\times \mathbf v)-\frac{2}{r^3}\frac{dr}{dt}(\mathbf r\times\mathbf v)\\\\= \frac{\mathbf r\times \mathbf a}{r^2}-\frac{2}{r^3}\frac{dr}{dt}(\mathbf r\times\mathbf v).
Name: Circular acceleration (N/A)

Identifier / Formula: F = \frac{d(mv)}{d t} = m\frac{dv}{d t} = m a,
Name: Newton's second law of motion (Q2397319)

Identifier / Formula: P(t+dt) = ( m - dm ) ( v + dv ) + dm ( v - u ) = mv+m dv - u dm = P(t) +m dv - u dm
Name: momentum (Q41273)

Identifier / Formula: t' = t  \\  x' = x - v t
Name: Galilean transformation (N/A)

Identifier / Formula: t' = \gamma \left( t - \frac{v x}{c^2} \right)  \\  x' = \gamma \left( x - v t \right)\,
Name: Lorentz transformation (Q217255)

Identifier / Formula: \text{power}  = \frac{\text{force} \cdot \text{linear distance}}{\text{time}} \\[6pt] = \frac{\left(\dfrac{\text{torque}} r \right) \cdot (r \cdot \text{angular speed} \cdot t)} t \\[6pt] = \text{torque} \cdot \text{angular speed}.
Name: power (Q25342)

Identifier / Formula: F_{net} = ma\, \\  F_{net} = ma_r\, \\  F_{net} = \frac{mv^2}{r}\, \\  F_{net} = F_c\,
Name: force (Q11402)

Identifier / Formula: F = m a = m \frac{\mathrm{d}^2x}{\mathrm{d}t^2} = m\ddot{x} = -k x.
Name: Newton's second law of motion (Q2397319)

Identifier / Formula: q_t (\tau) = \begin{cases} \mathrm{e}^{-\zeta\tau} \left( c_1 \mathrm{e}^{\tau \sqrt{\zeta^2 - 1}} + c_2 \mathrm{e}^{- \tau \sqrt{\zeta^2 - 1}} \right)  \zeta gt; 1 \text{ (overdamping)} \\ \mathrm{e}^{-\zeta\tau} (c_1+c_2 \tau) = \mathrm{e}^{-\tau}(c_1+c_2 \tau)  \zeta = 1 \text{ (critical damping)} \\ \mathrm{e}^{-\zeta \tau} \left[ c_1 \cos \left(\sqrt{1-\zeta^2} \tau\right) + c_2 \sin\left(\sqrt{1-\zeta^2} \tau\right) \right]  \zeta lt; 1 \text{ (underdamping)}\end{cases}
Name: equations of motion (N/A)

Identifier / Formula: \nabla W =  -\nabla U= -\left(\frac{\partial U}{\partial x}, \frac{\partial U}{\partial y}, \frac{\partial U}{\partial z}\right) = \mathbf{F},
Name: force (Q11402)

Identifier / Formula: W = F_g (y_2 - y_1) = F_g\Delta y = - mg\Delta y
Name: work (Q42213)

Identifier / Formula: r  = r_0 + \tfrac12 \left( v+v_0 \right )t \quad [3]\\v^2  = v_0^2 + 2a\left( r - r_0 \right) \quad [4]\\r  = r_0 + vt - \tfrac12 {a}t^2 \quad [5]\\
Name: equations of motion (N/A)
Newton' s second law of motion (Q2397319)
